ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine walked a little ways behind Shadow Wing, he could hear what she was saying, but was thinking as much about the base as anything. He there hasn t been

Lunarpine walked a little ways behind Shadow Wing, he could hear what 
she was saying, but was thinking as much about the base as anything. 
He there hasn't been a message from Prowl in quite some time, He'd 
called for transport over an hour ago with no response. A sure sign 
that something other than the storm had inturupted thier lives.

"You think our programminmg limits us?" Lunarpine gave a look up 
toward the sky, "we might be technological but we're still alive." 
our programming is only the base of our existence. Our spark is the 
core."
"Do you think we'd exist if the origional Autobots were still 
manufacturers?"
Lunarpine didn't know exactly know how to phrase the next question to 
not sound insulting. "A wise bot once told me""Some bots are built to 
follow thier leaders and some are built to follow thier sparks.""(For 
the sake of argument Lunarpine can't remember who.)

"I haven't heard any one give you an order, in an army that's how 
things work."What seperates you from the soldiers?"

Lunarpine knew the answer, he just wanted to hear it from her.

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse/KitKat/Battera/Shadow Wing/Savanna::
> 
> DarkMouse:: 
> She looked at Panzertron. She hoped that he would consider an 
> alliance with her group.  She was hopeful for the first time that 
> maybe, her group had a chance to win the war.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> KitKat::
> She gave a low growl at the two bots.  Thay had mouths the size of 
> Cybertron, but didn't act like they had a lot of brains.  They kept 
> saying that they were assassins.  She wasn't impressed.  She walked 
> outside and in wolf mode and went on a perimeter patrol.  She 
> wondered if Megatron would ever return to the base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> Battera::
> 
> At the beach with Cybershark, she was enjoying the ocean.  She flew 
> inches over the waves while Cybershark was swimming.  She loved the 
> cool water slpaching over her face and wings.  It felt wonderful.  
> She was glad to see CyberShark cheered up and happy again.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> She was walking in the direction of the new maximal base.  She 
would 
> be able to fly soon.  But that didn't make her feel any better.  
She 
> still didn't want to go back and deal with her failure as a 
fighter, 
> as a member of the team, as a bot.  She let down the team when she 
> was away.  The Ark was destroyed while she was gone and she felt 
> guilty about that.  She knew that she should have been there to 
help.
> She felt guilty about not being able to prove that she could 
fight.  
> She could survive. But she knew that she would eventually need 
help.  
> She had to admit to herself that even though she really liked 
> Lunarpine, it would never work. He was a survivalist.  he was a 
> fighter.  She felt like she had to be babysat.  She knew that a 
wolf 
> and an owl would never make it together.  That fact tore her spark 
in 
> two.  She walked through the snow and lightening headed for the 
> base.  Even thought she wished that the pred hunting her had 
slagged 
> her off.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> Savanna::
> She was enjoying the African sun.  She was teaching the cubs how to 
> pounce on prey and how to hunt. Even thought the prey for the cubs 
> was a small mouse she had killed and was tossing it around for 
them.  
> She was loving her life on the planet. 
> That night she had a dream.  A dream of her old ship.  Her old 
> commander and fellow bots.  She dreammed of the worm hole that 
> swallowed the ship and tore it apart.  She dreammed of her landing 
> and trasformation into a lioness.  She awoke in a cold sweat. 
> She remembered what had happened to her.  She remembered why she 
was 
> here.  She sat up and looked at her pride.  She didn't want to 
leave 
> her new family and friends.  But she knew what she had to do.
> She transformed into her bot mode and walked away.  it killed her 
> inside to have to do this.  But she had hope that one day, she 
would 
> return to her pridelands.  She opened her scanner and looked for 
> Maximal signals to home in on.
